casebody.data:
Fleenor, Appellee, v. Karr, Appellant.

[Cite as Fleenor v. Karr, 132 Ohio St.3d 18, 2012-Ohio-1578.]

(No. 2012-0020 Submitted April 4, 2012 Decided April 11, 2012.) Rodeheffer & Miller, Ltd., and Stephen C. Rodeheffer, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The certified question is answered in the negative. The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the cause is remanded for application of Havel v. Villa St. Joseph, 131 Ohio St.3d 235, 2012-Ohio-552, 963 N.E.2d 1270.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur.
